text: Bender Bending Rodriguez is a fictional animated robot made for the animated sci-fi sitcom Futurama. He is voiced by John DiMaggio. ==Fictional biography== Bender was made in Tijuana, Mexico. ==Catchphrase== Since his first appearance, Bender is known for saying "Bite my shiny metal ass" and tons of variations throughout the show. ==Reception== Bender is considered a fan- favorite among Futurama fans. Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1999 Category:Fictional robots Category:Fictional war veterans Category:Futurama characters
title: Bender (Futurama)
